name: crazycarpetJS
description: JavaScript library to create non-blocking content sliders

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc ./src/js/crazycarpet.js && mkdirp ./dist/js && babel src/js/crazycarpet.js -o dist/js/crazycarpet.js && uglifyjs dist/js/crazycarpet.js -o dist/js/crazycarpet.min.js

author: fatfish
